div.p:
MOTIONS AGREED TO WITHOUT DIS-
CUSSION.

Copies of all Orders in Council, memorials,
letters, telegrams, and other correspondence,
and all other documents and communications
in writing, between the first day of January,
1897, and the first day of May, 1903, relating to,
or concerning, or in any way having reference
to the granting of provincial autonomy to the
North-west Territories, or the creation of the
said Territories into a province, or provinces.â€”
Mr. Borden (Halifax).
